attributes.action: implement a two day working week
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Who hates working! Let's face it, the answer is most of us. So much so the extent that the average worker spends a signficant amount of time that they spend at work doing pointless non-related things.

It is a well known fact that employees benefit from time off from work. If employees have more free time then they would be much more efficient and they would spend less time whilst at work petitioning the PM for more time off!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
